types1:Item.types1:Description: Process Monitors Secure Agents Health and Reports Issues

process.name: SecureAgentMonitor
process.description: Process Monitors Secure Agents Health and Reports Issues

operation.expression: let $count_expected := count(tokenize($input.in_configuration/agentServices/text() , ',')) let $agentDetails := ($output.agentDetails) return for $agent in $agentDetails let $count_running := count($agent/agentEngines[agentEngineStatus/status/text() = "RUNNING"]) where $count_running != $count_expected or string($agent/active) != 'true' return $agent
